TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IconEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

Docs.summary: Provides a for visually choosing an icon.
Docs.permission: for access to unmanaged code. Associated enumeration:

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

MemberSignature.Value: protected static string CreateExtensionsString (string[] extensions, string sep);
.method familystatic hidebysig string CreateExtensionsString(string[] extensions, string sep) cil managed

Docs.param: An array of strings holding valid file extensions.
A string that specifies the separator character.
Docs.summary: Creates a string representing the valid file extensions for icons.
Docs.returns: A string containing the icon file extensions, or if is or empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by the CreateExtensionsString method is used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog> for choosing icon files.

MemberSignature.Value: protected static string CreateFilterEntry (System.Drawing.Design.IconEditor e);
.method familystatic hidebysig string CreateFilterEntry(class System.Drawing.Design.IconEditor e) cil managed

Docs.param: The for which the filter string will be created.
Docs.summary: Creates a filter string for the file dialog box.
Docs.returns: The filter string, created from the string returned by <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IconEditor.CreateExtensionsString%2A>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by the CreateFilterEntry method is used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog> for filtering icon files.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object EditValue (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, IServiceProvider provider, object value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object EditValue(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.IServiceProvider provider, object value) cil managed

Docs.param: A type descriptor context that can be used to provide additional context information.
A service provider object through which editing services may be obtained.
An instance of the value being edited.
Docs.summary: Edits the given object value using the editor style provided by the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IconEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method.
Docs.returns: The new value of the object. If the value of the object has not changed, this should return the same object it was passed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A service provider is provided so that any required editing services can be obtained.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IconEditor.EditValue%2A> method is not supported, the GetEditStyle method will return <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle>.
